effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
